ui-guide.welcome_message: Here you can see your PDT products and manage your PDT Products
ui-guide.tabs_step_1: Switch between Assets and Models tabs.
ui-guide.create_btn_content: Click here to create new PDT
ui-guide.search_content: Search for specific assets by their ID, Name or other properties.
ui-guide.filter_content: Filter the asset list based on specific criteria.
ui-guide.group_content: Group assets by Product Type or Manufacturer.
ui-guide.certificate_content: Click on it to view and manage certificates for each product.
ui-guide.assign_owner_content: Click on it to assign new owner of your product.
ui-guide.ownership_data_content: Click on it to see Ownership Data.
ui-guide.table_content: View detailed information about each product.
ui-guide.congratulations_message: You can now start managing your products.
